basics.name: Shubham Sahu
basics.label: Research Engineer
basics.summary: Research Engineer with 3 years of experience in implementing Software solutions in a fortune 500 company in the knowledge management and manufacturing domains. Researched, designed and delivered technological solutions E2E while interacting with clients directly.

education.institution: SRM Institute of Scienece and Technology, Chennai

work.company: Siemens Technology and Services Pvt. Ltd.
work.summary: Develop, Deploy and Maintain Technological solutions for Intelligent Software Foundation
highlights: Implemented Knowledge graph as a solution for project traceability for multiple business units.
Implemented knowledge graph for knowledge management and created an inner source for the department, to avoid reinventing the wheel.
Developed, deployed and maintained a platform for manufacturing industry client to access data from multiple data sources, leading to effective cost reduction.
Developed and deployed 2 projects E2E interacting with the clients directly.
